Description: Bracelet: consisting of fifty-nine shells, mostly 'Ancillaria' with some 'Nerita'.
Findspot: Excavated/Findspot: Mostagedda, Grave 2913 Found at the left wrist of a child
Curator's comments: Originally with beads (1929,1015.68). Bibliography: G. Brunton, ‘Mostagedda and the Tasian Culture’ (London, 1937), 7; Grave register, pl. VII.
Bibliographic references: Andrews 1981 / Catalogue of Egyptian Antiquities. Jewellery I (39)
